original_title: Patterns of Evidence: The Journey Home
overview: Tim shares how the Lord led his life on a journey to make the Patterns of Evidence films. Learn how you can join the journey to educate others about the historical credibility of the Bible.  I like to look at past family photos because they bring back memories. Some of these memories are happy and get better with time, and some are not so happy. This is what you will learn more about in: The Journey Home. It is a story of forgiveness and redemption.
tagline: The Untold Testimony of Tim Mahoney
title: Patterns of Evidence: The Journey Home
